content:
Hey, awhile ago someone made a request for a page on forge that provides an overview of the licence. I think it would be a good idea to have a small section somewhere the explains Rust's license at a very high level and links to some resources. I don't know whether that should be forge, the website, or the repo itself, but importantly I think there should be somewhere people can link each other to.

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-forge/issues/241
Having an explanation of why we use the dual-license we do, and what benefit it provides, seems like a very good idea.
